attributes.comment:
I strongly oppose the proposed changes as outlined in 8 CFR Part 103. These
proposed fees would place a significant hurdle and burden on immigrants desiring to
enter this country thru legal means. While I can appreciate the need for increased
revenues in processing applications, the cost for this should be borne by US
taxpayers, not fully by immigrants alone. I would prefer to see the fees remain at the
current schedule and any additional costs be subsidized by taxpayers. These
proposed fees are unfair and burdensome for new immigrants.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Jill Wright
